context_history.content: I want to learn about: css. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is the language used to describe the presentation of a web page. While HTML provides the structural skeleton, CSS acts as the 'skin' or 'decor' that controls colors, fonts, and layouts.

visual_content.detail: HTML (Structure), CSS (Presentation), Styled Website, CSS maps onto HTML to create the final visual result.
